name: 羅文偉
objective: 本課程內容包括質傳應用、粉粒體操作單元。
schedule:
1. Leaching and Extraction 
2. Gas Absorption 
3. Humidification Operations 
4. Drying of Solids 
5. Adsorption 
6. Filtration 
7. Mass Transfer
materials: McCabe, W. L., Smith, J. C. & Harriott, P., “Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering”, 7th ed., McGraw-Hill Co., 2005.
